page.title: 01REVIEW
page.content:
THE AREA CONSISTS OF ROLLING HILLY COUNTRYSIDE MAINLY USED FOR{DAIRY {FARMING}AND A LITTLE{ARABLE FARMING.
THE MAIN ROAD FROM{ASHBOURNE}TO {DERBY}RUNS THROUGH THE BLOCK.
A NOTEWORTHY WOODED VALLEY RUNS THROUGH PRIVATE LAND CALLED{OSMASTON {PARK.}THE REMAINS OF{OSMASTON MANOR} ARE TO BE FOUND ON THE SLOPES OF THE VALLEY WITH SEVERAL ARTIFICIALLY CONSTRUCTED LAKES BELOW.
SURVIVING OUTBUILDINGS AND A WALLED GARDEN FROM THE MANOR ARE USED AS A {NURSERY AND GARDEN CENTRE. { { SHOOTING AND FOX HUNTING}TAKE PLACE IN THE PARK AND SURROUNDING AREA.
